org.jgentleframework.context
Class AbstractServiceManagement

java.lang.Object
  org.jgentleframework.context.injecting.AbstractLoadingFactory
      org.jgentleframework.context.injecting.AbstractBeanFactory
          org.jgentleframework.context.AbstractServiceManagement
All Implemented Interfaces:
Context, IAbstractServiceManagement, IAbstractBeanFactory, Provider
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServiceProviderImpl
public abstract class AbstractServiceManagement
extends AbstractBeanFactory
implements IAbstractServiceManagement

This abstract class is an extension of Provider, is responsible for getBeanInstance method overriding. The getBeanInstance(Class, Class, String, Definition) method is overrided in order to customize the bean instantiation according as its configuration data. Moreover, this class provides some methods in order to manage customized Interceptors, matcher cache, ...

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
Provider, IAbstractServiceManagement
